name: MetaFilter hedgehog comment pointer for Stylish
description: Replaces the linked comment triangle pointer with a hedgehog. Based on the user script of the same name.

user.name: rf14
user.about: The MeFi styles here are based on the user scripts I posted on GreasyFork (and before that, Userscripts.org). I made these for folks who can't install user scripts, but can install user styles for the Stylish extension. If you'd rather use scripts with Greasemonkey or Tampermonkey, visit my GreasyFork page: https://greasyfork.org/en/users/2049-rf14 If you've already installed the user scripts and are wondering what the difference is: there's really none. If you're happy with how the scripts work for you, there's no need to switch to user styles. I did these for fun and to share with other MeFites for personal use. If you like any of these user styles or scripts, please consider donating directly to MetaFilter. If you run into an issue with any user styles I've posted, send MeFi mail to me or message me here (I'm not sure if I'll get notifications for comments in the Feedback section). I'll try to answer when I get a chance. If it turns out to be a fix that requires a lot of research/testing (I'm not a programmer), then it'll probably have to happen when I get extended free time (e.g. a holiday). - rangefinder 1.4

additional_info: This is the user style version of my Greasemonkey/Tampermonkey user script. They both accomplish the same thing. More details and screenshots here: https://greasyfork.org/en/scripts/1529-metafilter-hedgehog-comment-pointer Version 4.0 (* note: this is actually the first public release of the user style. The versioning starts at 4.0, to match the version of the user script on which it's based) As of 2016-08-21: Tested to be working in Firefox and Chrome. Should work for all official MeFi themes (Modern, Modern Dark, Classic, Plain). If you're using this with the Classic or Plain themes *and* have Plutor's metafilter_scroll_tag script enabled: Edit the z-index in the user style to a negative value ("-10;") to display the Scroll Tag marker above the hedgehog layer. Credits * The hedgehog image is licensed by Depositphotos.com/(c) artjazz: http://depositphotos.com/3438006/stock-photo-Hedgehog-isolated-on-white.html * This particular hedgehog was suggested by jessamyn: http://metatalk.metafilter.com/21102/hooray-for-readability#936714
